English:
Sigh, dragging my bones to work in Shibuya through
this crush of people every day is murder... Wish
my company'd just open up in EDEN already.
Chinese:
每天都要到人潮擁擠的涉谷出勤，真的很累人。
我們公司如果也能早點在EDEN建立公司就好了……
Korean:
매일 사람이 많은 시부야에 출근하는 건 고달파.
우리 회사도 빨리 EDEN에 회사를 만들어
주지 않으려나…
German:
Puh, meine alten Knochen jeden Tag durch dieses
Gemenge nach Shibuya zur Arbeit zu schleifen ist
höllisch. Wann gibt’s meine Firma endlich in EDEN?

English:
Wow...so this is the famous Shibuya Tower Records!
It's huge!
Chinese: 嗚哇……不愧是涉谷的淘兒唱片！　好大喔……！
EnglishCensored:
Wow...so this is the famous Shibuya Records!
It's huge!
German:
Wow ... Dies ist also der berühmte „Shibuya Records“
in Shibuya! Der ist ja riesig!

English:
These people in the ad are gonna play live in an
EDEN forum. Meeting them in person would be
awesome! I mean, in virtual person, but still...
Chinese:
這廣告裡的人，之後好像要在EDEN討論區裡
舉行演唱會。雖然是數位化，但能直接見到面
還是很開心，我要不要去啊～
Korean:
이 광고에 나온 사람, 이번에 EDEN 포럼에서 라이브를 한다고 하더라.
디지털이라고는 해도 직접 만날 수 있는 건 좋으니까, 가볼까나~
German:
Die Leute in der Werbung werden live in einem
EDEN-Forum auftreten. Wäre toll, sie in Person zu
treffen! Also, in virtueller Person, aber dennoch!

English:
Hmm. Might stop by the CD store again today. Who
knows, maybe there's somethin' good.
Chinese:
今天順道去一下CD店好了，
說不定會發現什麼好CD。
Korean:
오늘도 CD숍에 들렸다 갈까~
뭔가 좋은 CD 들어와 있을지도 모르니
German:
Hm. Vielleicht schaue ich heute noch mal beim
CD-Laden vorbei. Vielleicht haben sie ja etwas
Gutes.

English:
Ho hooo, it's the CD store! Mmm, maybe they've got
dat new Jimiken? Maybe so? Bet they've got some
~special bonus trax~ LOL
Chinese:
啊，這不是CD店嗎～？
難道有在賣吉米肯的CD嗎～
有賣對吧～現在說不定還能買到有附特典的喔～
Korean:
앗, 여기 CD숍이잖아?
혹시 지미켄의 CD도 팔고 있을까~
그럴지도 모르겠네~, 지금이라면 특전도 줄지도~ㅋㅋㅋ
German:
Ohhh, der CD-Laden! Vielleicht haben sie die neue
Jimiken-Platte? Die hat bestimmt ein paar ganz
besondere Bonus-Tracks! LOL!

English:
Wait, are you Jimiken? OMG shut up LMAO!!! How are
you here right now! ROFL How is the real Jimiken
here?!
Chinese:
咦，你問我是不是吉米肯？
等等，怎麼可能啦～
他本人怎麼可能出現在這種地方～
Korean:
에, 네가 지미켄 아니냐고?
잠ㅋㅋㅋㅋ설마~ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
이런 곳에 본인이 있을 리가 없잖아~ㅋ
German:
Moment, du bist doch Jimiken! OMG, meine Fresse!
LMAO! Was machst du denn hier? ROFL! Was macht
denn der echte Jimiken hier?!
